translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_58cfcc64

segments.source_content: # Introduction

translations.zh-CN: # 简介

segments.source_content: daily.dev is a professional network for developers that provides the latest tech news and articles all in one place.

translations.zh-CN: daily.dev 是一个面向开发者的专业网络平台，汇聚最新技术资讯与文章。

segments.source_content: We curate posts from over 1300 tech news sources and present them in a single feed that you can customize to your interests using tags. Our platform helps you save time by finding high-quality posts, so you can stay up-to-date and stay ahead of the curve as a developer.

translations.zh-CN: 我们从1300多个技术新闻源精选内容，通过标签系统为您定制专属信息流。平台能高效筛选优质内容，助您保持技术前沿，在开发者领域持续领先。

segments.source_content: <iframe width="700" height="400" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/igZCEr3HwCg" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen title="Introduction video for daily.dev"></iframe>

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_5da3670c

segments.source_content: ## Quick start guide

translations.zh-CN: ## 快速入门指南

segments.source_content: We want you to get the most out of daily.dev, so we've put together this quick start guide to help you make the most of our platform and our community.

translations.zh-CN: 为了让您充分发挥daily.dev的价值，我们准备了这份快速指南，助您高效使用平台功能并融入开发者社区。

segments.source_content: ### Step 1: Install 🚀

translations.zh-CN: ### 第一步：安装 🚀

segments.source_content: You can use daily.dev as a [browser extension](/getting-started/browser-extension-installation.md) or as a [progressive web app (PWA)](/getting-started/pwa.md).

translations.zh-CN: 您可通过[浏览器扩展](/getting-started/browser-extension-installation.md)或[渐进式网页应用(PWA)](/getting-started/pwa.md)使用daily.dev。

segments.source_content: Also available on the Google Play store as [Android app](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=dev.daily).

translations.zh-CN: 亦可在Google Play商店下载[安卓版应用](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=dev.daily)。

segments.source_content: We recommend the browser extension, which sets your new tab to show daily.dev and helps you develop a good reading habit. But don't worry, you can always pause the new tab functionality if you need to focus!

translations.zh-CN: 推荐使用浏览器扩展——它会将新标签页设为daily.dev，帮助培养阅读习惯。当然，需要专注时您随时可以暂停新标签页功能！

segments.source_content: ### Step 2: Set up your feed 🎯

translations.zh-CN: ### 第二步：配置信息流 🎯

segments.source_content: Once you've installed the extension or accessed the web app, the next step is to [create your personal feed](/setting-up-your-feed/filtering-content-feed.md). This allows you to customize daily.dev to your preferences and interests, providing you with the most relevant tech and developer news.

translations.zh-CN: 安装扩展或访问网页应用后，请立即[创建个人定制信息流](/setting-up-your-feed/filtering-content-feed.md)。这将根据您的偏好推送最相关的技术资讯。

segments.source_content: ### Step 3: Engage with other developers 👏

translations.zh-CN: ### 第三步：开发者互动 👏

segments.source_content: Check out some of our [key features](/key-features/feeds.md) and start engaging with other developers on our platform to help grow your professional network and make new connections.

translations.zh-CN: 探索我们的[核心功能](/key-features/feeds.md)，开始与平台开发者互动，拓展您的专业人脉网络。

segments.source_content: ### Step 4: Build your presence 🦸

translations.zh-CN: ### 第四步：建立个人形象 🦸

segments.source_content: On daily.dev, you can [create a profile](/your-profile/activity.md). With a profile, you can comment on posts, upvote, bookmark useful posts, showcase your reading with our DevCard, and much more!

translations.zh-CN: 在daily.dev上您可以[创建个人资料](/your-profile/activity.md)。拥有资料后即可评论帖子、点赞、收藏有用内容，还能通过DevCard展示阅读轨迹等！

segments.source_content: ### Step 5: Customize the look and feel 🌈

translations.zh-CN: ### 第五步：界面定制 🌈

segments.source_content: Make daily.dev look and feel the way you want! [Customize](/customize-your-feed/layout.md) the theme, layout, card density, and other cool preferences to personalize your experience.

translations.zh-CN: 按您喜好[自定义](/customize-your-feed/layout.md)主题、布局、卡片密度等参数，打造个性化体验。

segments.source_content: You can use daily.dev as a [browser extension](/getting-started/browser-extension-installation.md) or as a [progressive web app (PWA)](/getting-started/pwa.md).

translations.zh-CN: 您可通过[浏览器扩展](/getting-started/browser-extension-installation.md)或[渐进式网页应用(PWA)](/getting-started/pwa.md)使用daily.dev。

segments.source_content: Also available on the Google Play store as [Android app](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=dev.daily)

translations.zh-CN: 亦可在Google Play商店下载[安卓版应用](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=dev.daily)

segments.source_content: We recommend the browser extension, which sets your new tab to show daily.dev and helps you develop a good reading habit. But don't worry, you can always pause the new tab functionality if you need to focus!

translations.zh-CN: 推荐使用浏览器扩展——它会将新标签页设为daily.dev，帮助培养阅读习惯。需要专注时您随时可以暂停该功能！
